title: Cannabis Is a Surprise Winner in the Pandemic
itunes:title: Cannabis Is a Surprise Winner in the Pandemic
description:
Boris Jordan, Executive Chairman at Curaleaf, discusses acquisitions, earnings and accommodating increased demand.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
